hero.title:
Manage Your Software
Bill of Materials
hero.description: SBOMHub is an SBOM management platform that provides CycloneDX/SPDX import, vulnerability management, VEX statement creation, and compliance checking.

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Everything you need for software supply chain security

import.title: SBOM Import
import.description: Import SBOM files in CycloneDX and SPDX formats. Compatible with major tools like Syft, cdxgen, and Trivy.

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability Management
vulnerability.description: Automatically detect component vulnerabilities with NVD database integration. View by severity level.

vex.title: VEX Statements
vex.description: Create and manage Vulnerability Exploitability eXchange (VEX) statements. Record false positive exclusions and response status.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Compliance checking feature aligned with METI (Japan) SBOM guidelines.

cicd.title: CI/CD Integration
cicd.description: Upload SBOMs via API from CI/CD pipelines like GitHub Actions.

i18n.title: Multilingual
i18n.description: Optimized for the Japanese market. UI supports both Japanese and English.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.description: Choose a plan that fits your team size. Start with a free trial.

cta.title: Start Managing Your SBOMs Today
cta.description: Strengthen your software supply chain security. Try all features free for 14 days.

footer.description: Open-source platform for managing and visualizing Software Bill of Materials (SBOM)

Home.title: SBOMHub
Home.description: Open-source platform for managing and visualizing SBOMs
